Class WorkflowExpressionBuilder

Provides a base class for expression builders that generate their output by means of an encapsulated workflow.

Namespace: Bonsai.Expressions
Assembly: Bonsai.Core.dll
Syntax
[WorkflowElementCategory(ElementCategory.Combinator)]
public abstract class WorkflowExpressionBuilder : ExpressionBuilder, IWorkflowExpressionBuilder, INamedElement, IPropertyMappingBuilder, IExpressionBuilder, IRequireBuildContext

Initializes a new instance of the WorkflowExpressionBuilder class with the specified expression builder workflow.

protected WorkflowExpressionBuilder(ExpressionBuilderGraph workflow)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ExpressionBuilderGraph workflow

The expression builder workflow instance that will be used by this builder to generate the output expression tree.

Type Description
System.String

PropertyMappings

Gets the collection of property mappings assigned to this expression builder. Property mapping subscriptions are processed before evaluating other output generation expressions. In the case of an encapsulated workflow, mappings to nested workflow properties are also allowed.

Declaration
[Obsolete]
[Browsable(false)]
public PropertyMappingCollection PropertyMappings { get; }

Methods

BuildWorkflow(IEnumerable<Expression>, Expression, Func<Expression, Expression>)

Builds the output of the encapsulated workflow for the specified source and applies a selector taking into account any available workflow mappings.

Declaration
protected Expression BuildWorkflow(IEnumerable<Expression> arguments, Expression source, Func<Expression, Expression> selector)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> arguments

A collection of System.Linq.Expressions.Expression nodes that represents the input arguments.
System.Linq.Expressions.Expression source

The expression tree that will be used as input to the encapsulated workflow.
System.Func<System.Linq.Expressions.Expression, System.Linq.Expressions.Expression> selector

A selector that will be applied to the output of the encapsulated workflow to determine the final output of the expression builder.
Returns
Type Description
System.Linq.Expressions.Expression

An System.Linq.Expressions.Expression tree that is the result of applying the encapsulated workflow to the specified input source. Property mappings are also resolved in the correct sequence.
